data.name: Zumbi Blocks
data.detailed_description:
Zumbi Blocks is a game of survival by working with your friends at the zombie stink.
You need to call the materials and build your own base in the districts and fight against the zombies otherwise your friends and you will die.

Materials

Bandages, bullets and other supplies are necessary for you and your friends to survive.
Army planes are throwing "S.O.S" supplies and bullets into the quarantine zone at certain times, so you need to open your eyes four times.

Weapons

If you want to survive in the region of Quarantine you should choose your weapons well.
Close combat weapons are great weapons for shredding zombies, but not enough for more than one zombie, so you can use an offensive weapon.

Defense

You can build barricades in a single-door large house in the Quarantine area, and you can build yourself a defense base.

Traps

Seals, mines, defenses may be good for you if you use trap materials to make your area a safer place.

data.short_description: Build your own defense base with your friends in the quarantine zone and survive against zombies !

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 , 8 , 8.1 , 10 / 32-bit
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual-Core 32-bit CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 512 MB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 , 8 , 8.1 , 10 / 64-bit
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual-Core 64-bit CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 1 GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
